Headline: #49 Western Temporary Southbound Reroute near Western/Ogden
ShortDescription: Southbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Roosevelt, Damen 18th, due to street blockage near Western/Ogden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #49 Western buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, Roosevelt, Damen 18th, then resume their normal route on Western, due to street blockage near Western/Ogden.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #18 16th/18th Temporary Eastbound  Reroute near Western/Ogden
ShortDescription: Eastbound #18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Ogden, Roosevelt, Damen, 18th, due to street blockage near Western/Ogden.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #18 16th/18th buses are temporarily rerouted via Ogden, Roosevelt, Damen, 18th .then resume their normal route, due to street blockage near Western/Ogden. 

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #48 South Damen and #94 South California Temporary Reroute near Damen/74th
ShortDescription: 48 South Damen and 94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Damen/74th, due to street blockage near Damen/74th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How will this affect my trip?

 

#48 South Damen and #94 South California buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Damen/74th, due to street blockage near Damen/74th.

#48 South Damen buses will operate via Damen, 71st, Ashland, 74th, Damen and over regular route.

#94 South California buses will operate via Damen, 71st, Ashland, 74th and over regular route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local Northbound  Reroute near Jeffery/91st
ShortDescription: Northbound J14 Jeffery Jump & 15 Jeffery Local buses are temp rerouted via Jeffery, 93rd, Stony Island, and 87th due to, street blockage near Jeffery/91st.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound J14 Jeffery Jump & #15 Jeffery Local buses are temporarily rerouted via Jeffery, 93rd, Stony Island, and 87th: due to, street blockage near Jeffery/91st.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Delayed at Addison
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Addison due to police activity. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are standing at Addison due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
